meanings.definition: To give more than someone else.
meanings.sent1: She always outgives her friends by sharing her snacks.
meanings.sent2: The generous donor outgives all others in the community.
meanings.sent3: The kind teacher outgives even the most giving students!
meanings.sent4: Her heart outgives her wallet when it comes to helping others.
meanings.sent5: Outgiving is her superpower, making her a true hero.

meanings.definition: To provide or supply more than is required or expected.
meanings.sent1: The hotel outgives its guests with complimentary breakfast and free Wi-Fi.
meanings.sent2: The company always outgives its customers with excellent service.
meanings.sent3: The bakery outgives the neighborhood with delicious pastries every morning.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity outgives any limitations she faces in her work.
meanings.sent5: The sun outgives warmth to all living creatures on Earth.
